description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take control of a Tank in a classic style arcade shooter with a few new tricks. Use the scenery to rebound your shots into the other Tanks. Play a variety of game types and backdrops with up to 3 friends or have the computer stand in.   Features include: 1-4 players Substitute AI with 3 difficulties 5 game modes 2 backdrops Dedicated Widescreen and 4:3 layouts
